titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the suspension of duties on certain glass fibers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/26/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on certain fiberglass. Makes changes to the size description of such fiberglass.
